New Records: South Africa beat Australia by 134 runs
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored 109 runs in 106 balls
Pre-Game Insights: Australia captain Pat Cummins won the toss and asked South Africa to bat first
Post-Match Reflections: Australia captain Pat Cummins said 'If we want to be challenging for this tournament you’ve got to try to find a way in all conditions. I think not much needs to be said tonight, everyone’s hurting.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Temba Bavuma was reprieved twice while scoring 35 runs
Glenn Maxwell bowled De Kock with one that crept through after hitting the left-hander’s bat as he attempted a reverse-pull
Marcus Stoinis and Mitchell Starc put down chances on a sloppy day in the field
